oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: I Gotta Lotta Lovin - Joe Maphis and Rose Lee Maphis performance - 1957-03-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of I Gotta Lotta Lovin, written by Joe Maphis, published by Laredo Publications and Vidor Publications Inc., produced by Don Law, recorded on March 12, 1957 at Radio Recorders studio in Hollywood, CA, released by Columbia on September 9, 1957, and performed by Joe Maphis (guitar and vocal), Rose Lee Maphis (vocal and guitar), Marian Hall (steel), Dale Warren (bass), Billy Hill (fiddle), Margie Ann Warren (fiddle), Marian Adams (drums), and Jimmy Pruett (piano).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Maphis; Rose Lee Maphis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Joe Maphis and Rose Lee Maphis perform "I Gotta Lotta Lovin"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Maphis, Joe, 1921-1986; Maphis, Rose Lee; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Columbia Records, Inc; Pruett, Jimmy
